columns.name: project_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the project record (primary key).

columns.name: name
columns.description: Project name/title (often includes internal codes and client/site naming).

columns.name: country
columns.description: Country where the project is located.

columns.name: client_company_name
columns.description: Client company name associated with the project.

columns.name: time_zone
columns.description: IANA time zone used for the project (e.g., 'Europe/Paris') to interpret dates/timestamps.

columns.name: city
columns.description: City where the project is located.

columns.name: start_date
columns.description: Project start date (as stored; appears to be a string, e.g., '31/01/2023').

columns.name: description
columns.description: Free-text description of the project scope/context.

sample_rows_note: The example shows a construction monitoring project in Toulouse (France) with a start date stored as DD/MM/YYYY text.
